articles.author: Lori Rozsa
articles.title: Judge orders temporary halt to new construction at Alligator Alcatraz - The Washington Post
articles.description: The ruling by U.S. District Court Judge Kathleen Williams came after a two-day hearing in a lawsuit filed by environmental groups and joined by the Miccosukee Tribe of Indians.
articles.content: A federal judge in Miami on Thursday ordered construction to be paused at Floridas Alligator Alcatraz, the first state-run detention center in the country opened to accommodate the Trump administrati… [+4049 chars]
